item.description: Modern pricing and billing for the AI era The all-in-one monetization engine that finds the right price for every customer. Power recurring billing, usage-based and outcome-driven models while leveraging data-driven pricing across billing, revenue recognition, retention and reporting—so you can focus on growing revenue. Book a demo Start free trial Metering Pricing plans Paywalls Targeting Experiments Trusted by the top companies.

item.title: Build nothing, Bill everything!

item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: ParityDeals, operated by Samay Labs, Inc. (“we,” “us,” or “our”), is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our services and website. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at hi@paritydeals.com. 1. Information We Collect # We collect the following types of information: User Information: Basic details such as name and email address for authentication and account management purposes.
